name: japanese-anki-client
description: This is an application for learning Japanese vocabulary.

scripts.install: git submodule update --init --recursive && npm i -g @angular/cli && cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd backend && npm i && cd ..
scripts.start: concurrently -n Frontend,Backend,Auth "cd client && npm start" "cd backend && npm start" "cd auth && npm start"

author: Luis Scholl
